targets.query: SELECT last("uptime") AS "value" FROM "system" WHERE "instance" =~ /$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("free") AS "value" FROM "disk" WHERE "instance" =~ /$instance$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("available_percent") AS "value" FROM "mem" WHERE "instance" =~ /$instance$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE instance =~ /$instance/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE instance =~ /$instance/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_recv), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE instance =~ /$instance/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(packets_sent), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE instance =~ /$instance/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_in), 1s) as "in" FROM "net" WHERE instance =~ /$instance/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance,interface fill(none)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(drop_out), 1s) as "out" FROM "net" WHERE instance =~ /$instance/ AND interface =~ /(vlan|eth|bond).*/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance,interface fill(none)
